Author: tulipsandmothballs
Text: My extremities swell all the time. Feet, ankles, hands, and wrists. It’s maddening. I know how swollen I am if I can or can’t get my wedding band off.

Author: sneeakyraccoon
Text: Yup! So many things influence it for me- walking, standing, hormonal changes, eating more food, salt, drinking a lot of water, right before I “woosh”... I could probably name a few other things but know you’re not alone. And my thighs/hips are my problem area so I feel sooo bad about it lol
